title: What are some great romantic writing prompts? - Quora

response.answer_text: Romance is one of my favorite ever subjects. How about these: The cashier who works at the local co-op has a crush on the Kale Lady. She is always in a hurry. How to catch her attention?Boating accident. The Coast Guard who comes to the rescue is an ex-flame from high school.Webcam girl has a crush on whoever’s in the framed photo, on the wall, behind one of her routine customers.Two people have been married for years. Then one of them turns into a rabbit. And then what?If any of these works for you, please share with us! xoxo, Tipsy

Haven’t watched an episode of Friends since it went off the air in 2004. In fact, some might consider me a staunch anti-rerunner. (An overwhelming number of new shows await me on a Netflix queue.) Yet, this past weekend I found myself in a strange location (yes, somewhere like another planet) where I couldn’t locate the control panel on the TV. And the remote was mysteriously not-in-sight. And you guessed it- the channel was set on the episode of Friends. I got caught up in the scene where Ross becomes aware that Rachel has feelings for him. I was floored. It pressed the “hopeless romantic” button on MY control panel. Thus, that pivotal millisecond when one is struck by the awareness of the romantic feelings of another is my winning romantic prompt of the day!
